channel.title: Need help please
channel.description: how do i change the item that jad drops i need him to drop villager sandels but i dont know where to put the code in in confused omg...i made a new minigame and when u use sandels on a chest i put at home it gives u firecape that way ppl dont stay at the end of jad minigame.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2008, 11:07:31 pm[/size][hr]please help
